report.title: Full species index
report.description: A report which lists all Pantheon species along with trait data.
report.query: select #columns# from pantheon.species_index si join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=si.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdt join pantheon.designation_mappings dmt on dmt.taxon_designation_id=ttdt.taxon_designation_id and dmt.mapping_class='IUCN Threat listing' ) on ttdt.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdt.deleted=false left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdr join pantheon.designation_mappings dmr on dmr.taxon_designation_id=ttdr.taxon_designation_id and dmr.mapping_class='GB Rarity listing' ) on ttdr.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdr.deleted=false left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdall join taxon_designations tdall on tdall.id=ttdall.taxon_designation_id and tdall.deleted=false ) on ttdall.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdall.deleted=false where 1=1 #filters group by si.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id, cttl.taxon_id, si.species, si.rarity_score order by species desc;

column.name: proposed_score
column.sql: case when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] -- also 'Extinct' but not in mapping data and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['CR', 'CR(PE)', 'RE', 'pCR'] -- also 'EX' and 'EW' but not in data then 32 when (array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['EN', 'pEN']) -- EN (European) is excluded. then 16 when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['VU', 'pVU'] then 8 when (array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', '[Rare]'] -- Include [Rare] as probably wrong but assume Scarce (email 2023-12-04 D. Heaver) and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'pLC', 'pDD', 'pNT']) -- Also 'NE' but not in the data. DD & NT (European) are excluded? then 8 when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'NT'] -- Also 'NE' but not in the data. DD & NT (European) are excluded. What about pLC & pNS? then 4 when array_agg(dmr.output_label) = array[null::varchar] -- also 'Introduced' but not in the data. and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'VU', 'EN', 'CR', 'CR(PE)', 'pLC', 'pDD', 'pNT', 'pVU', 'pEN', 'pCR'] -- DD, EN & NT (European) are excluded. then 1 -- If the new review finds nothing, use the original old review designations. when array_agg(tdall.code::text) && array['RDB 1', 'pRDB 1'] -- also RDB - App but not in data. Does [RDB - 1] get counted? then 16 when array_agg(tdall.abbreviation::text) && array['RDB 2', 'pRDB 2', 'RDB 3', 'pRDB 3', 'Notable', 'Notable-A', 'Notable-B'] then 8 when array_agg(tdall.abbreviation::text) && array['RDB I', 'RDB K'] then 4 -- default to 1 if no rarity score. else 1 end
